actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Subcommittee on Water Resources, Transportation. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 101-208.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources, Transportation and Infrastructure

official_title: A bill to authorize the Corps of Engineers to collect and remove floating material wherever it is collecting and removing from New York Harbor debris which is an obstruction to navigation.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to collect and remove all floating material whenever the Secretary is collecting and removing debris which is an obstruction to navigation in New York Harbor. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Corps of Engineers to collect and remove floating material wherever it is collecting and removing from New York Harbor debris which is an obstruction to navigation.
